sentence.Network_en: Some of the ideas are very intriguing and sound intuitively plausible.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些想法非常吸引人，听起来觉得很有道理。

sentence.Network_en: He seemed to know intuitively that I must be missing my mother.
sentence.Network_cn: 他似乎凭直觉知道我肯定在想母亲。

sentence.Network_en: She intuitively understood his need to be alone.
sentence.Network_cn: 她凭直觉就知道他需要独处.

PerfectNetExp.abs: a host of：大量，许多intuitively：直觉地destined for：命中注定……
He seemed to know intuitively how to do it ., 他似乎凭直觉知道如何做.
avoid making intuitively obvious but unfounded assertions .避免作出直觉上显而易见却没有根据的论断。

list.abs: 教育学中常用词汇 ... direct discipline 直接训练 intuitive method 直观法 intuitional instruction 直观教学.
心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... intuitive phase 直觉期 intuitive thinking 直观思维 intuitive thought 直觉思想.
intuitiv... ... intuitive approach 直觉方法 intuitive knowledge 良知 intuitive manner 直观方式，直观状态，直觉方式，直觉状态.

entry.def: If you have an intuitive idea or feeling about something, you feel that it is true although you have no evidence or proof of it.

example.ex: A positive pregnancy test soon confirmed her intuitive feelings.
example.tran: 阳性孕检结果很快证实了她的直觉。

sentences.sentence: "inventors seem to have chosen intuitively a combination of explosive and aggressive sounds as warning signals to be used on automobiles"

auth_sentence.content: Most of us have a landscape we intuitively comprehend.
auth_sentence.res_content: Most of us have a landscape we intuitively comprehend.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Most of us have a landscape we intuitively comprehend.

auth_sentence.content: My patients intuitively understand where we need to go.
auth_sentence.res_content: My patients intuitively understand where we need to go.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My patients intuitively understand where we need to go.

auth_sentence.content: Intuitively many of us find this frustrating and unacceptable.
auth_sentence.res_content: Intuitively many of us find this frustrating and unacceptable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Intuitively many of us find this frustrating and unacceptable.

sentences.en: Avoid making intuitively obvious but unfounded assertions.
sentences.cn: 避免作出直觉上显而易见却没有根据的论断。

sentences.en: She intuitively understood his need to be alone.
sentences.cn: 她凭直觉就知道他需要独处。
